topic.title: I have developed the Nigger Blocker, to block all scum
topic.body:
An advertisement says: give me something and I will give something in exchange.
Annoying, but bearable.

A nigger says: give me the best you got that conforms to all my needs and I will give you nothing.
Niggers are definitively the worst.

To counter that trash, I made an AI that reads every message and hides it if it detects that a nigger was behind it.

The next step is to make it detect nigger pics, then nigger videos, then nigger sounds.

Bye, bye, niggers.

topic.title: Has ZeroNet had its first commercial transaction yet?
topic.body: Did a buyer and a seller met here and exchanged money for goods or services at least once?
